snippet: The museum has revealed designs for a redevelopment of its 14-acre campus, including a 164,000-square-foot-building and a new home for the Glassell School of Art.
abstract: The museum has revealed designs for a redevelopment of its 14-acre campus, including a 164,000-square-foot-building and a new home for the Glassell School of Art.

headline.main: Museum of Fine Arts, Houston Unveils Expansion Design
